noun.description: The action or practice of making a prank call to emergency services in an attempt to bring about the dispatch of a large number of armed police officers to a particular address.
examples: he found out that he was a victim of swatting after police surrounded his home on Thursday
the officers realized they had been sent to the house as part of a swatting prank

origin: Early 21st century: with reference to the possibility that a SWAT team will be dispatched.
